com.travelbank.knit

Interface ViewToPresenterMapInterface


  • public interface ViewToPresenterMapInterface
    When KnitProcessor scans classpath, it creates a class called ViewToPresenterMap that implements ViewToPresenterMapInterface. This class contains all data such as which presenter requires which data and what their parent classes are. Also maps all views to their KnitPresenters. This is how UsageGraph determines dependencies. This class is loaded via KnitUtilsLoader.

    • Method Summary

      Returns which KnitPresenter the given view should be attached to.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUpdatingValues(java.lang.Class clazz)
      Returns a list of all data tags that a given KnitPresenter has it's ModelEvent methods tagged with.
